<sp:3:0:2:0300>And if we're really unlucky, she'll drag both of us

Talk10:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Babi has been training hard since we fought
the Gibdos.

She's the one who told us that our spears wouldn't
even leave a mark though...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Up till now, I've been training extra hard
with the spear with Babi, but...

Maybe it's time we formed a bow-and-
arrow unit.

Once I've finished up polishing this spear,
I think I'll let Babi know that I want to
change directions.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Yup, just gotta finish with this spear, then I'll be
ready... Maybe.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk20:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Instead of practicing with our regular spears, should
we be looking for a <clr:0000>weapon that has electricity
flowing<clr:ffff> through it?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The real fighting is gonna start soon, but
I'm still sore from Babi's scolding and
from all the extra training after that.
She knows that regular spear attacks
won't do anything against the Gibdos.

<sp:3:0:2:0300>We shouldn't be lax about our training,
of course, but I want her to acknowledge
that there's more to a successful battle.
You know, things like <clr:0000>gathering intel and
learning an enemy's weaknesses<clr:ffff>...
Talk19:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>The only thing that seemed to have any effect at all
was <clr:0000>Lady Riju's<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>lightning strikes<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Angry_00>That messenger earlier...<sp:5:0:0> I wonder if it
had anything to do with the Gibdos...
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You could be right...


Still, it's amazing—and a bit wild—that
Babi is training so intensely.

I mean, spear attacks didn't even slow
those Gibdo things down.
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:LaughS>Our preparations were perfect!


Now all that's left is to stab, stab, stab!
Talk29:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive_00>I don't know what the message was, but
it was enough for Buliara to head for
<clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>.

Talk13:
